title: Zed and Ekko skin ideas
body:
These two skins would be matching sorta. They would be based off of Tron Legacy. Zed would be red/orange (or whatever the color that Clu is in it), and Ekko blue.

Zed's Q could be like one of the discs from Tron Legacy, his shadow could be replaced with a hologram, his e could have particles similar to Ekko's, and his ult would create a hologram ghost, and, instead of rising from a shadow in the ground, Zed could appear from a portal similar to the portals in Portal. Instead of that shuriken that floats over the head of targets of his R when they're going to die, it could be one of the said discs, and it could have a robotic voice-over, new robotic sounds, and his R's explosion could sound robotic and mechanical.

It would basically be the same with Ekko, except his R's trail would be like a lightcycle trail and his W would look like a giant disc or something?

Both of them would have death animations of derezzing into little blocks.
